metadata.title: CVE-2016-4414 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The onReadyRead function in core/coreauthhandler.cpp in Quassel before0.12.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference and crash) via invalid handshake data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4414` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

quassel - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-client - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-core - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
quassel-data - 1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quassel package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.12.4-2ubuntu2').
